rows.label: qst106101_msg0001
rows.name:
Do you know the shop called
Llysiau Greens?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0002
rows.name:
There's a girl who works there, Tenne.
She's such a bright and cheerful lass,
but last month she lost her father...

rows.label: qst106101_msg0003
rows.name:
Her mother's succumbed to illness a
while ago, it was just the two of them.
I feel so bad for her now, all alone...

rows.label: qst106101_msg0004
rows.name:
She's got the brains to put out new
products, no problem, but running a
shop by herself must be hard.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0005
rows.name:
As you can probably tell, I'm worried
about her, so...I'd like you to save
her business!

rows.label: qst106101_msg0006
rows.name:
First of all, buy one piece of
every product that's on offer.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0007
rows.name: That'll let Tenne know you mean well.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0008
rows.name:
What that means is, she'll let you buy
the deeds to Llysiau Greens.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0009
rows.name:
When you do that, you'll become the
shop's owner. With me so far?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, when I say owner, I don't mean
like sharing in the profits, but relax!
There's plenty of benefits to it still.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0011
rows.name:
Tenne will be relieved to know that
someone like you has her back, and
she'll be able to get on with things...

rows.label: qst106101_msg0012
rows.name:
And you'll get special boons too.
For example, things like making
harvesting easier, or running faster.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0013
rows.name:
How about it?
Can I count on you?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0014
rows.name: That's the right answer!

rows.label: qst106101_msg0015
rows.name:
Like I said before, then.
First, buy the whole selection
of goods at Tenne's shop.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0016
rows.name:
Including the new Puri Leaf Salad,
of course! Well, off you go!

rows.label: qst106101_msg0101
rows.name:
First you buy every product that
is sold at Llysiau Greens.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0102
rows.name:
That means the Crispy Saut√© and the
Trigo Marinade... And then...

rows.label: qst106101_msg0103
rows.name:
The Stuffed Meaty Carrot and that
Puri Leaf Salad they've just introduced.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0105
rows.name:
It's fine to buy just one of each.
Got that?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0201
rows.name:
Now you should be able to buy the
Llysiau Deeds over at Llysiau Greens,
am I right?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0202
rows.name:
I know, I know, it's not cheap.
Nevertheless, I'd like you to buy it next.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0203
rows.name: Please. You know I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst106101_msg0301
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0302
rows.name:
It feels really great to see Tenne
smiling again.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0303
rows.name:
She's always been cheerful and kind,
but also kind of stubborn...

rows.label: qst106101_msg0304
rows.name:
I know she doesn't need her old friends
like me looking over her shoulder.
She can stand on her own feet.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0305
rows.name:
I know this, but still... I can't help being
a little worried, can I? I just wanted to
give her a hand, just a bit.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0306
rows.name:
With your help, I think she'll have found
the confidence she needs for the shop
she inherited to thrive.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0308
rows.name:
Oh, and also, you know it's not just
Tenne's shop, right? Other businesses
work much the same way.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0309
rows.name:
Buy every item they have, and
they'll start offering to sell you
their deeds.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0310
rows.name:
Buy that and you'll get a nice fat
advantage. Different ones, depending
on the shop.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0311
rows.name: Ah, one word of warning though.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0312
rows.name:
It's not every shop that'll offer all
their products from the get-go.
Few do, in fact.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0313
rows.name:
In those cases, you'll have to raise the
development level before they'll sell
everything, letting you get the deeds.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0314
rows.name:
And sometimes, if they don't seem to
offer the deeds no matter what, it's
worth trying again in a little bit.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0315
rows.name:
Oh, haha, sorry to keep you so long!
I can stop being such a busybody now.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0316
rows.name:
You have my gratitude.
Thanks, for everything!
